title: Five-Spiced Pumpkin
description: Cinders loves two things in life: her father, and her pet calf Sancho. But her simple life is turned upside down by the arrival of a new Stepmother and her two daughters. Charity doesn't want a stepfather or a stuck up stepsister, especially one with an interfering old Grandmother who seems intent on stirring up the house.Can these two girls ever get past their first impressions of one another and learn to deal with their personal heartaches?
author: Jacqueline Curry
